{{about|a song by The Rocket Summer||Wall (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Single | Name = Walls | Cover = | Artist = [[The Rocket Summer]] | from Album = [[Of Men and Angels]] | Released = February 2010 | Format = [[Music download|Digital download]]
[[CD Single]] | Recorded = [[2009]] | Length = 4:48 | Genre = [[Pop rock]]
[[Power pop]] | Label = [[Island Def Jam]] | Writer = [[Bryce Avary]] | Producer = | Certification = | Chart position = | Last single = "[[Do You Feel]]"
(2006) | This single = "'''Walls'''"
(2006) }} "'''Walls'''" is the lead single from [[The Rocket Summer|The Rocket Summer's]] album ''[[Of Men and Angels]]''. The song was written by The Rocket Summer frontman Bryce Avary, and was released in February 2010. In an interview with [[AOL]], Avary stated that the song is "about struggles and about having issues in your life that you just can't seem to quite get a grip on, whether that's depression or whether that's anything."{{cite|web |title=Exclusive JSYK Interview |url=http://www.jsyk.com/2010/02/24/exclusive-interview-with-the-rocket-summers-bryce-avary |publisher=[[AOL]] |accessdate=28 February 2010}} ==Promotion== The Rocket Summer premiered the single in an acoustic performance at [[To Write Love On Her Arms|To Write Love On Her Arms']] Heavy and Light on January 9, 2010.{{cite|web |url=http://www.nme.com/awards/video/id/b7U5cmni4_s |title=Walls (acoustic) The Rocket Summer-Heavy & Light video |accessdate=15 May 2010}}{{cite|web |url=http://www.nme.com/awards/video/id/b7U5cmni4_s |title=Heavy and Light 2010 |author=Steve Henderson |accessdate=15 May 2010 |date=3 December 2009 |publisher=AbsolutePunk.net}} On January 13, 2010, "Walls" became available for listening on the band's [[MySpace]].{{cite|web |title=New Single "Walls" |url=http://www.therocketsummer.com/news_d.aspx?nid=6042 |accessdate=26 January 2010}}{{cite|web |title=The Rocket Summer Releases Of Men and Angels |url=http://www.christiantoday.com/article/the.rocket.summer.releases.of.men.and.angels/25390.htm |accessdate=10 March 2010}} Shortly after ''Of Men and Angels'''s release, Avary performed the album's lead single "Walls" on [[KDFW]]'s ''Good Day Dallas'' and [[KTBC]]'s ''Good Day Austin'' to promote the album.{{cite|web |title=FOX Good Day Performance |url=http://www.myfoxdfw.com/dpp/good_day/the-rocket-summer-performs-on-good-day}} In April 2010, the song was used as the backing track in [[NBC|NBC's]] television show ''[[Friday Night Lights (TV series)|Friday Night Lights']]'' promotional ads,{{cite|web |url=http://www.islanddefjam.com/artist/news_single.aspx?nid=6675&artistID=7336 |title=Walls on Friday Night Lights |publisher=[[Island Def Jam]] |accessdate=15 May 2010 |date=20 April 2010}} and was featured later that month on [[NBC|NBC's]] ''[[The Biggest Loser]]''.{{cite|web |url=http://www.therocketsummer.com/news_d.aspx?nid=6691 |title="Walls" on the Biggest Loser |accessdate=15 May 2010 |date=26 April 2010}} ==External links== *[http://www.therocketsummer.com/ Official The Rocket Summer website] ==References== [[Category:2010 singles]]
